Telegram, the encrypted messaging app and longtime drug-dealer haven, is planning to monetize in 2021, founder Pavel Durov said on Wednesday.

articles.content: Apples iPhone 12 became the worlds best-selling 5G smartphone in October, despite having only two weeks of sales across the month. According to global marketing firm Counterpoint Research, Apples lat… [+637 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: The Apple iPhone 14 should be the first smartphone packed with powerful 3nm chips - PhoneArena
articles.description: Apple has already ordered A-series and M-series chips from TSMC for 2022 according to a new report. These will be the first manufactured using the 3nm process-node.
